Name: Sword Maker
About the game: Do you want to design your own weapons like the ones in movies and games? With this app you can easily design your own swords from the fantasy world. This App is an intuitive tool that allows you to create your own unique sword art by combining a wide range of parts. You can also upload your sword to our server and share it with other users around the world. You can also download the sword data from the server and customize it to your liking. You can create your own illustration in the following steps 1ï¼ŽSelect the blade. 2. Select a Tsubag 3. Select the handle 4. Select the head 5.Select and place the decoration You can choose the size of each part freely. You can also paint it with your favorite colour! You can save your illustration in PNG format. Please let us know if there are any parts you would like us to add! The saved image information will be saved in the device and cannot be recovered after uninstalling the app. If you want to add more parts, please let us know! About operation with the controller Cross key: Move cursor ABXY key: cursor press
